subject: Football
Cheating
Physics
lead_paragraph: A Princeton physics professor concluded that an equation known as the Ideal Gas Law could not account for the low pressure of the Patriots’ footballs at halftime of New England’s playoff victory against the Indianapolis Colts.
snippet: A Princeton physics professor concluded that an equation known as the Ideal Gas Law could not account for the low pressure of the Patriots’ footballs at halftime of New England’s playoff victory against the Indianapolis Colts.
